entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
